content: comment: It looks like there aren't many useful #[bench] tests inside the compiler and stdlib. I assume that the effort to bench the performance characteristics basically goes through measureme/rustc-perf instead?

In contrast to std, there is no way to properly benchmark the compiler via microbenchmarking.
You can run rustc-perf locally but its very long and you shouldn't use the PC whole this time to avoid influencing the benchmarks.
